name: Create new leads in SharpSpring from new Mailchimp subscribers
description:
This template periodically checks for new subscribers in Mailchimp and uses the retrieved information to create new leads in SharpSpring.

The template expects your MailChimp list to have at least these fields besides email:
1) First name
2) Last name

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
